sentences.sentence: He kissed her chastely on the cheek.
sentences.translation: 他在她的脸上留下了一个纯洁的吻。

sentences.sentence: Grant us to live chastely in word and act, that we may live a life of heroic virtue and not fall away from Thy promised blessings.
sentences.translation: 求赐我们谨言慎行，善度贞洁的生活，如此，生活于德行之中，我们将不会背离你所预许的福泽。

sentences.sentence: Now look right at paragraph 9: "All the women and young people go into him and are taught by him you must, he says, fear one single God only and live chastely."
sentences.translation: 现在看第九段：，“所有女人和年轻人走进他并受到教诲，你们必须，他说，只畏惧一个上帝，贞洁地活着。”
